short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly visualize patterns and textures in a simple, feature-rich interface.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pattern Preview is a unique visualization tool built for artists, designers and creatives. It provides a quick and efficient way to preview patterns and textures. This extension offers a user-friendly, web-based interface that simplifies the process of viewing and auditing patterns in both 2D and 3D contexts. It enables users to effortlessly load and visualize a diverse range of imagery, enhancing their creative workflow. Whether you're fine-tuning your pattern design or conceptualizing a new texture map, Pattern Preview is your go-to resource for real-time pattern and texture visualization.
